overview: Guns of El Chupacabra is the Epic Saga of how Jack B. Quick, Space Sheriff (Scott Shaw) battles his way across the galaxy to defeat the intergalactic beats, El Chupacabra and emerges as the Reverend Doctor Saint Francis Blade.
tagline: One Blood Thirty Monster. One Space Sheriff. And One Million Bullets.
title: Guns of El Chupacabra
